title: "First win ofthe day" bonus not giving BE
body:
My poro bruhs,

I got FWotD Bonus, but the UI shows I got 575 XP instead of the mentioned 50 BE + 400 XP mentioned in patch notes.

I don't think I recieved 50 BE as I remember I was super close to 6300 BE to get a new champ, but I may have been on the lower end of 6200s when I started. 

Would it be possible for you guys to go into my account and check whether I recieved 575 XP or 50BE +400XP?

If I did get 50BE+400XP, would you be able to forward this over to the UI team and have them change their visuals? If I didn't get 50BE+400XP, do you know when the change will happen?

replies.body: Hey friend of poros!  The adjustment to missions aren't live yet.  Per the[ patch notes](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-723-notes) it's slated to go live during this patch cycle, but not just yet.  I don't have any info on when it will activate, hang tight!

If it's supposed to happen, "during," a patch instead of on patch release (where discussed changes happen) it should really say so, like it does on most other things, but as I read in client, "We've heard folks asking for ways to gain Blue Essence while in between levels, especially so you can buy champions that would otherwise be just out of your reach. So we're converting some of the XP from the First Win of the Day boost into straight-up Blue Essence."  As opposed to also in the same patch notes: "Battle boosts will be reactivated in ARAM at some point _during_ patch 7.23" (emphasis added). {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
